Package View.Interfaces

Interface GameManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
CliGameManager, GuiGameManager
public interface GameManager

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void printReadyToStart​(boolean starting, God assigned)
    Tell the player that the game is ready to begin and if it is the first to start
    void printWin​(boolean win)
    Invoked when someone wins
    void showGod​(java.lang.String[] god)
    On CLI it prints the list of the gods On GUI it cleans the GameManagerPanel
    void startMatch()
    Invoked to tell the player that is connected to the server
    void updateMap​(int[] island)
    Show the updated map to the player
    void waitForPlayer()
    Tell the player that it has to wait for another player to join the match

  • Method Details

    • startMatch

      void startMatch()
      Invoked to tell the player that is connected to the server

    • waitForPlayer

      void waitForPlayer()
      Tell the player that it has to wait for another player to join the match

    • printReadyToStart

      void printReadyToStart​(boolean starting, God assigned)
      Tell the player that the game is ready to begin and if it is the first to start
      Parameters:
      starting - true if the player on this client is the first to start
      assigned - the randomly chosen god for the player

    • updateMap

      void updateMap​(int[] island)
      Show the updated map to the player
      Parameters:
      island - the updated map

    • showGod

      void showGod​(java.lang.String[] god)
      On CLI it prints the list of the gods On GUI it cleans the GameManagerPanel
      Parameters:
      god - a single god, with name and description

    • printWin

      void printWin​(boolean win)
      Invoked when someone wins
      Parameters:
      win - true if it's the player on this client to have won
